thing-type.label: Zerodim 2 phase Q-light / Q-Light Zerodim 2phase
thing-type.description:
Q-light / Q-Light Zerodim 2phase

Overview

Zerodim Z-Wave 2 pole is a universal LED dimmer based on the Z-Wave protocol.Â 

Features:

  • 0-99% dimming range
  • 2-180W LED load
  • Compatible with any Z-Wave or Z-Wave Plus Controller
  • There is memorized function at power off
  • OverLoad protection
  • Soft start function
  • SmartStart

This device is a security enable Z-Wave Plus product that is able to use encrypted Z-Wave Plus messages to communicate to other security enable Z-Wave Plus products.


Inclusion Information

Quickly, three times press the rotary button to enter inclusion mode


Exclusion Information

Quickly, three times press the rotary button to enter exclusion mode

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Minimum brightness level
parameter.description: Set the desired value from 1 to 98% for the minimum dim level that the dimmer is restricted to; the dimmer will not go lower than the value set here.

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Maximum brightness level
parameter.description:
Set the desired value from 2 to 99% for the maximum dim level that the dimmer is restricted to; the dimmer will not go higher than the value set here.

Overview

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Automatic control - dimming step size
parameter.description:
This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the automatic control.

Overview

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: Automatic control - time of a dimming step
parameter.description:
This parameter defines the time of single dimming step set in parameter 3 during the automatic control.

Overview

1 - 255 (0.1 - 2.55 s) in 10ms steps

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Manual control - dimming step size
parameter.description: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the manual control.

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Manual control - time of a dimming step
parameter.description:
This parameter defines the time of single dimming step setting parameter 5 during the manual control.

Overview

1 - 255 (0.1 - 2.55 s) in 10ms steps

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: State after power failure
parameter.description:
Restore state after power failure

Overview

0=no restore of state

1=restore state

parameter.name: config_8_2
parameter.label: 8: Scene ID set
parameter.description: Scene ID is set by this configuration. Note: The actual action of each SCENE ID are set by SCENE_ACTUATOR_CONF(0x26) command.
